form.hostTooltip: Supports IP range for batch add (e.g., 192.168.1.10~192.168.1.15, add mode only)
form.errorInvalidIpRangeFormat: IP range format should be start_ip~end_ip
form.errorInvalidIpFormat: Invalid start or end IP address format
form.errorIpRangeNotSameSubnet: IP range must be within the same C-class subnet (e.g., 1.2.3.x ~ 1.2.3.y)
form.errorInvalidIpSuffix: The last part of the IP address must be a number between 0-255
form.errorIpRangeStartAfterEnd: The start IP of the range cannot be greater than the end IP
form.errorSshKeyRequiredForBatch: When batch adding SSH (key auth) connections, an SSH key must be selected.
form.errorPasswordRequiredForBatchSSH: When batch adding SSH (password auth) connections, a password must be provided.
form.errorPasswordRequiredForBatchRDP: When batch adding RDP connections, a password must be provided.
form.errorPasswordRequiredForBatchVNC: When batch adding VNC connections, a VNC password must be provided.
form.errorBatchAddResult: Batch add: {successCount} succeeded, {errorCount} failed. First error: {firstErrorEncountered}
form.errorIpRangeNotAllowedInEditMode: IP range is not supported in edit mode. Please use a single IP address.
form.scriptModeSubmitPlaceholder: Script mode submission logic to be implemented.
form.scriptModePlaceholder: Enter connection script, one connection configuration per line.
form.scriptModeFormatInfo:
Format: user@host:port [-type TYPE] [-name NAME] [-p PASSWORD] [-k KEY_NAME] [-proxy PROXY_NAME] [-tags TAG1 TAG2...] [-note NOTE_TEXT]
Parameter Explanation:
  user@host:port  - Username@Hostname or IP:Port (required)
  -type TYPE      - Connection type (SSH, RDP, VNC; defaults to SSH)
  -name NAME      - Display name for the connection (optional; defaults to user@host)
  -p PASSWORD     - Password (required for SSH password auth, RDP, VNC)
  -k KEY_NAME     - SSH key name (required for SSH key auth, corresponds to an uploaded key)
  -proxy PROXY_NAME - Proxy name (optional, corresponds to a configured proxy)
  -tags TAG1 TAG2 - List of tags, space-separated (optional)
  -note NOTE_TEXT - Connection notes (optional, supports text with spaces, use quotes if it includes special characters)
form.scriptErrorMissingHost: Script line '{line}' is missing the 'user@host:port' part.
form.scriptErrorInvalidType: Invalid type '{type}' in script line '{line}'. Valid types are SSH, RDP, VNC.
form.scriptErrorInvalidUserHostPort: Invalid format for '{part}' in script line '{line}'. Expected 'user@host' or 'user@host:port'.
form.scriptErrorMissingType: Script line '{line}' is missing connection type or type is invalid.
form.scriptErrorInvalidUserHostFormat: Invalid user@host format in script line '{line}'.
form.scriptErrorMissingPasswordForSsh: Script line '{line}' (SSH password auth) is missing password (-p).
form.scriptErrorMissingKeyNameForSsh: Script line '{line}' (SSH key auth) is missing key name (-k).
form.scriptErrorInternal: Internal parsing error while processing script input.
form.scriptErrorTagNotFound: Script processing error: Tag '{tagName}' not found.
form.scriptErrorSshKeyNotFound: Script processing error: SSH Key '{keyName}' not found.
form.scriptErrorNothingToProcess: No valid connection data to process.
form.scriptErrorMissingAuthForSsh: SSH connection must provide password (-p) or key name (-k)
form.scriptErrorKeyNotApplicableForRdp: Key name (-k) is not applicable for RDP connection
form.scriptErrorKeyNotApplicableForVnc: Key name (-k) is not applicable for VNC connection
form.scriptErrorInvalidUserHostPortFormat: Invalid format for '{part}', expected format is 'user@host' or 'user@host:port'
form.noAvailableSshConnectionsForJump: No available SSH connections for jump host. Please create some SSH connections first.

test.latencyTooltip: This measures the time to establish a new SSH connection (TCP, Proxy, SSH Handshake, Auth). It's typically higher than interaction latency on an already established connection.
test.errorMissingFields: Please fill in Host, Port, Username, and select an Auth Method.
test.errorUnknown: An unknown error occurred during testing.
